ARABIC: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحْمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We endowed him with Our mercy, making his brother Harun a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And bestowed on him his brother Aaron, a prophet, through Our benevolence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and out of Our mercy We appointed his brother Aaron, a Prophet (that he may assist him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Out of Our mercy We gave him his brother Aaron who himself was a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And with Our mercy We bestowed upon him his brother Haroon, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We granted him his brother Harun, (also) a Prophet, out of Our mercy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We gave to him out of Our mercy his brother Haroun a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We gave him his brother Aaron, of Our mercy, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We bestowed upon him of Our mercy his brother Aaron, a prophet (likewise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We gave him as his helper, out of Our mercy, his brother Aaron, having made him a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We bestowed on him, out of Our mercy, his brother Harun, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And, out of Our Mercy, We gave him his brother Aaron, (also) a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We bestowed on him his brother Harun (Aaron), (also) a Prophet, out of Our Mercy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: From Our Mercy We gave him, his brother Aaron, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We granted him, out of Our mercy, his brother Aaron, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron as a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:53] And We gave him out of Our mercy, Our grace, his brother Aaron (Hārūn, either a substitution [for akhāhu, ‘his brother’], or an explicative supplement [thereof]), [likewise] a prophet (nabiyyan, a circumstantial qualifier, constituting the import of the ‘gift’ [to Moses], which was in response to his [Moses’s] request that He [God] send forth his brother with him; he [Aaron] was older in years than him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We bestowed upon him of Our mercy) from Our blessing (his brother Aaron, a prophet (likewise)) a helping assistant.
